description: A simple flange with a 60mm outer diameter, 30mm inner hole, 10mm thickness, and four 8mm diameter bolt holes evenly spaced on a 50mm pitch circle diameter.

result = (
    cq.Workplane("XY")
    .circle(30)  # inner hole radius
    .extrude(10)
    .faces(">Z")
    .workplane()
    .circle(30)  # inner hole
    .circle(60)  # outer diameter
    .extrude(0)  # create face for bolt holes
    .workplane(offset=10)
    .polarArray(25, 0, 360, 4)  # bolt holes on PCD=50 (radius 25)
    .hole(8)
)
